uncc2014watsonsim.uima.documentSearch

Class LuceneDocumentSearch

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.uima.analysis_component.AnalysisComponent_ImplBase
      • org.apache.uima.analysis_component.Annotator_ImplBase
        • org.apache.uima.analysis_component.JCasAnnotator_ImplBase
          • uncc2014watsonsim.uima.documentSearch.LuceneDocumentSearch
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.uima.analysis_component.AnalysisComponent

    public class LuceneDocumentSearch
extends org.apache.uima.analysis_component.JCasAnnotator_ImplBase
    This is a sample primary document search AE. It expects a CAS with a QUERY view, and uses the contents of the QUERY view to perform a document search. The output from this AE is a SearchHitList added to the QUERY view of the CAS. This is currently not doing anything, it is simply here so we can generate the rest of the xml files at this time (3/19/14)
